outputs.output_descr: Fiji Millennium development goal (MDG) project builds the capacity of the Fiji Government to monitor & report on MDG achievement on a regular basis, to identify gaps & inform policy debate to identify the challenges address the gaps in MDG achievement

project_descr: Strengthen MDG reporting process that enables improved MDG reporting and enhanced national and local capacities to analyse MDG needs assessments that inform MDGbased national policies, plans and budget on key development challenges.
project_title: Fiji Millennium Development Goals Based Planning
